BBEX3.A.ETB.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Ethiopia / USD 1 = ETB ... (middle)
Source: Since December 2011: Commercial Bank of Ethiopia, Addis Ababa.1996 - November 2011: National Bank of Ethiopia, Addis Ababa.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end middle rates, from September 1998 on the basis of buying and selling rates.

Comment on 2010: On 1 September 2010, the Ethiopian birr was devalued. Calculated using the exchange rates (buying/selling) from 31 August (USD 1 = ETB 13.6284 / 13.900968)  and 1 September (USD 1 = ETB 16.3514 / 16.6784 ) the birr was devalued by 16.7%.
